website_summaries.verdict: Unless you absolutely need a camera in your favorite color, give this one a pass.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: This item was obviously not tested before being sent. Though I bought used, I expected it to at least power on and be functional. It does not and is not.
customer_reviews.author: grace.10

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, quick on screen directions and changes. The camera makes some disturbing sounds out of the box, they can be disabled from the menu and I would suggest turning them all off. When first turned on the focusing parts move out and makes a small noise. This is the second camera of this model - the first one the battery had to be returned (that takes a while). Normal for a commodity electronic item, mass production will always have lemons and QC problems. A bit slow... shutter, response and refresh all a bit slow, but what I would expect at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Old Pro

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my wife a couple years ago and it has been wonderful. Pictures come out great and the camera itself is extremely easy to use with a lot of features. The only thing I will look for different in our next camera is the ability to find a waterproof case (or just get a waterproof camera). One piece of advice, use name brand SD cards, I don't know if it was the card or the camera didn't like the cheap SD I put into it but few of the pictures came out and it would lock up the camera. When I put a name brand card back in, the camera worked normal.
customer_reviews.author: John Green

customer_reviews.title: Best camera out there for such a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughers 21st birthday. Having just had a baby, her old camera was too slow to catch all the"firsts" in his life. I looked for specific features, such as reaction time, red eye reduction, rechargeable battery, good quality video and such. I was far surpassed in my delight at this camera!! It was more than I thought I could get for what I could afford, and now, I wish I had bought one for myself as well. My daughter loves it, and you should see the pictures of my little grandson! Great product, I have already reccomended it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Roobee

customer_reviews.title: EASY SHARE EASY ORDER
customer_reviews.text: Have used this little camera with high praise for years but it did not survive water in So. Calif. Kodak said they didn't carry them anymore but an Amazon seller did. Perfect in everyway with even additional accessories all for $20.00. Even Kodak recommended Amazon for my search!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. S. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this camera for the video feature
customer_reviews.text: I can't review the photographic quality of the camera, since I took it out of the box, turned it right to video to capture my baby's babbling. It was easy to use sure, but when I went to see the video, all I could hear was the camera's motor!! The machine noise was louder than my baby! I had a Kodak v570 (no longer made :(, and this camera is not nearly the same quality. It's light and feels cheap, not a metal case. I put it right back in the box and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Target Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but...
customer_reviews.text: Used the camera for about 15 days before it actually failed. Although it appears esthetic in both shape and color, it must be quite fragile. Positives...it took nice very clear pictures. It was fast and the screen was large enough to review easily. When it worked I really felt it was a good value. Not So positive. The camera quit while I was taking pictures. Bummer. Now I have a wonderfully pretty pink screen. I can't take pictures and I am beginning to sense that I have wasted the $150 invested. My advise...choose something else. However...it's your money...and I am only person. I have other Kodak cameras...I bought this because of the 8mp feature. Hope this helps some of you.
customer_reviews.author: S. Janiak

customer_reviews.title: Kodak V803 Digital camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera was in very good shape overall, the outer signs of age & wear were correctly discribed. The camera worked very well although I couldn't manage to get the flash feature to work and when I brought this concern up to the seller, I was given options to makeup for the problem and eventually returned the camera for a full refund. The seller later responded & admitted that the flash did work although I was unable to do that. I am satisfied with this seller and I feel they are trustworthy & honest and I would likely purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Leadsled401

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Camera...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned two of these cameras. I love it. It is easy to use and takes great pictures. I definitely would buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Roy H. Wilhite, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is my first digital camera and it takes fantastic pictures. My family and I went to Ripley's Believe it or not in St. Augustine and the photos came out great.. outside and inside. Outside I used the general (auto) setting and inside I used the museum setting. All the pictures came out amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I have had some very high end cameras that did not take photos as well as this one! Nice and clear and with great detail and color! I am sold on this and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Briar

customer_reviews.title: Nothing works like it.
customer_reviews.text: Last one tore up and had to have the exact same one. Nothing works like it .
customer_reviews.author: tosh

customer_reviews.title: Looks count.
customer_reviews.text: Check your records - this item was returned. It was scratched, worn, and completely unacceptable. It may have worked fine, but I was not taking the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Shary Sheek

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé had this camera previously and it was stolen. She liked it so much, that we replaced it with the exact same model even several years after the original one had been purchased. Sure there has been new developments but this one worked to our satisfaction and was extremely easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: this camera is not worth it i thought i got a good buy but it broke twice in one year and now its totally gone and kodak and amazon was of no help
customer_reviews.author: b.r.

customer_reviews.title: This camera is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, clear sharp pics, and- finally!- a girly style (pink for me). Compatible with my outdated EasyShare camera stuff, software and memory card etc (guess you can tell this grandma is new at this). Takes great closeups of my wiggly puppies and grandkids!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Oglesby

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I have already recommended this camera to others. It met all my expectations. Large LCD screen, excellent clarity. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera was defective, as it would no turn on ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera appeared defective, as it would no turn on and light up, after inserting the provided battery and pressing the ON/OFF switch. Seller failed to check out the camera before shipping it out? No recharge cord included. After I bought a recharge cord and plugged it in, it charged the battery and camera began working. May also need to buy a battery if battery won't hold charge very long.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little Gadget
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! I had a Kodak prior to this new one which was the most reliable little point and shoot... it always took good pictures and so does this one. I would highly recommend purchasing Kodak cameras over other brands. They are easy to use, foolproof AND less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zabrodsky

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera, takes great pictures, even in low light. very easy to change settings; very user friendly. everyone wants to know what kind of camera i am using. great price for product.
customer_reviews.author: D. sharick

customer_reviews.title: impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is my first camera. It so happens that my daughters friend had a Kodak and I really enjoyed it, enough to purchase my own. I haven't had a chance to "use" it. Already it seems to meet my requirements and expectations. I don't need but basics but it has the bells and whistles too. Good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: D M Davis

customer_reviews.title: v803
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Takes wonderful daytime pictures. At night they aren't as good and are a little fuzzy. Overall it is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera after some comparison shopping, and have found it to be a great value. It is comfortable to carry, easy to use, and takes very good photos. I especially like the ability to overide the automatic settings and get a little creative with this camera. It has a high ISO, which allows you to take existing light photos, even at night. I recommend this camera, especially for under $200, it is a real deal. Negatives? A bit bigger screen, and perhaps a bit better optics. (The optics aren't bad, just not great, but this is typical of sub $300 aim and shoot cameras.) Overall, I am very pleased with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: burnsey

customer_reviews.title: Weighs 3.5 ounces!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic camera. I almost considered not buying it because the description on Amazon says it weighs a full pound which for a cyclist, is heavy to carry around in a pocket on your bicycle. I got it out of the package, added the battery and weighed it and it weighs only 3.5 ounces! The picture quality is fantastic. The 2.5 inch LCD viewer is wonderful. Even the video it takes is great. I love the pink camera and it comes in other colors too. Extremely simple to set up and use. Buy it and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Cristin

customer_reviews.title: Purple Passion
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love first of all with the color of the camera...I LOVE PURPLE! After receiving this camera right before Christmas, I haven't put it down...I've taken pictures at all of my family events which include the debutante ball, graduation, birthdays, college road trip party, etc. and the pictures are phenominal! I change the background on my computer every week because I have so many wonderful pictures stored in my camera. I recommend this camera for not only the quality of the pictures, but also the price. I have truly gotten my money's worth plus some...enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: S. Frempong

customer_reviews.title: excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for the camera for my wife as a birthday present.i decided to look on amazon because i have had success on here before with excellent prices and deliverys.the camera was a replacement for one previously boughten,and i found exactly what i was looking for.i purchased it on a thursday,and it weas in my mailbox on saturday afternoon.me nd my wife was very pleased with the camera,the price,and the manner in which it was delivered to us in a 2 day span.i highly recommend this service to anyone looking for products and looking for a prompt delivery and satisfactory experienc eoverall
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Vernier

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, easy to use winner!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for about 5 years. It is small and compact and despite some rough handling, some dropping, I have never had any problems with it. It takes great pictures, both long views and close ups. It even does a pretty decent "macro" picture after cropping. It is very easy to learn to use, has good options as far as focus. The auto setting is good, the zoom feature is easy to use. The battery lasts a long time. Overall, for the price I paid, about $180 at the time, it has been a very good buy. Would recommend this for someone who wants a camera to take shots for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Pixy5

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have used Kodak cameras before and expected much better from this one. I have been having problems with the camera's shutter for months. After sending it to be repaired once, the camera would sometimes make a grinding noise and fail to turn on. It would often take several times to get the camera to power up, and I would sometimes miss picture opportunities. The camera was sent in to fix the powering on problem, and the problem has come back again. I would recommend saving a lot of time and postage and getting something else. This camera is a frustrating piece of junk--instead of capturing good moments, I've ended up being upset because my stupid camera still doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Having Trouble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera - Kodak EasyShare V803 8MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Mystic Purple) for my neice as a birthday present. The good part is it worked on her birthday. The bad news is that it hasn't worked since. Her mother has been trying to contact the supplier to return it for over three weeks. They've been closed for the holiday(?). So, I'm not happy with this purchase at all and will not buy any other electronic items from Amazon or their vendors. I will have Amex involved in this by this coming Monday, if the problem is not resolved. Amazon's good for books and anything without moving parts and that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Holmes

customer_reviews.title: LCD screen breaks very easily!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera a few months ago and I was very disappointed with the quality of the pictures from day one. They tend to be very grainy. You can take the same picture twice and it's just hit or miss but no predictability. I only had the camera for four months and I went out and the LCD screen broke. I didn't drop it, it was possibly just sitting in my purse the wrong way. It is extremely delicate and it costs an arm and leg to get the LCD screen replaced. I suggest to you all avoid this and kodaks in general. If you look online you'll see this is a common problem.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: this is the best gift i could have ever given to my teenage daughter, she will not leave home without it. this camera has seen more use than anything i have ever bought. not a single problem with the camera or software, itstalled with vista
customer_reviews.author: EZdoesIt

customer_reviews.title: Great snapshot camera.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to use and has suited my purposes very well so far. I am not really worried about the technical details and I think that the V803 is a very good snapshot/point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: METALLIFAN23

customer_reviews.title: Thank you to everyone who posted
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for everyone who posted a review. I was just outside taking pictures (it is freezing out)... and the camera just froze up. I quickly became annoyed, came inside and googled "problems" on this type of camera. To my surprise, this is apparently a common problem that it freezes when you are in a cold place???. After reading one of the posts, I took the battery out and put it back in and was able to actually shut the camera off! Thank you everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Przybylowicz

customer_reviews.title: V803
customer_reviews.text: not bad quick reveiw: 1 save feature alows you to save all your picures you take 2 its got a camcorder feature lets you record 1 hour of video 3 you have to buy a card key to transfer your media on your pc over all its a smooth model for digital cameras very nice i give it a 4 because, i love old skool poloroids haha but its definetly the one of smoothest digital cameras out there and state of the art as of the past year or so
customer_reviews.author: a.

customer_reviews.title: Best camera ever
customer_reviews.text: I have been through a lot of cameras. I wanted a camera that would just take a nice picture of my baby easily with no red eye and finally after all the hard work i found it. I have had a canon, sony, panisonic,casio,and then now this kodak. It is the best purchase i have ever made and it will be yours too. You will be amazed with the quality of the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: klj4ever

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I have ever owned,
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I own a Canon Powershot, I should of kept my money because this Kodak is way better than the Powershot. Tons more features, better picture quality, and the picture touch technology makes this thing a steal. I would gladly pay up to $300 for this camera, its well worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: TMac

customer_reviews.title: Mrs.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is all I hoped for!! It's great!!!! Oh and the company was is terrific too.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rietzke

customer_reviews.title: This camera rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally pleased with this camera! I bought mine (red) last summer before going to a tech conference where most attending had digital SLRs. This camera easily kept up with the high end cameras. I was able to shoot good video in a dark aquarium, do stitched landscape shots on the ocean, and take all sorts of killer candids. I'm buying several more for my students to use. I especially love the long battery life. I've had it since July and have only charged it about once a month with frequent use. I hope the battery life continues!
customer_reviews.author: Tami Brass

customer_reviews.title: 6 months, already not working!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this camera at first and have only had it 6 months. Great pictures, so easy to use, nice video feature, etc. But here it is 6 months later, it's jammed, frozen, won't work and it's the holidays. I have to send it in to be fixed with no clue when I'll get it back. I've baby'd this thing and am never rough on it nor have gotten it moist, wet, anything. NOT IMPRESSED!
customer_reviews.author: SunnyBeachLife

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this camera. The pictures are clear and it is very user friendly. In fact, my only complaint of this product is that it is VERY EASY to accidently hit the delete all button for the pics! Otherwise, it is lightweight and takes great photos.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C. Schaad

customer_reviews.title: I <3 my camera
customer_reviews.text: I received the camera and I thought, "it's too cute!" It's small and can fit in your pocket. Once I started using it I hadn't really taken advantage of all its cool features but now I use them all the time to crop photos without having to do it on the computer. It wasn't too expensive and it's 8 MEGA PIXELS!!
customer_reviews.author: Y. Fraga

customer_reviews.title: Great buy - - -Kodak 8.2mp camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera to grab and go. What I like best about it (and the last kodak I had (5.2mp)) is the software. As a casual camera user, I nver know which mode to choose when I shoot photos, but the Kodak tells you as you scroll thru like 20 different options. It also takes very crisp shots and travels easily. I used to be an Olympus guy, but Kodak's user interface has swayed me.
customer_reviews.author: Derek E. Muller

customer_reviews.title: Short lived LCD screen
customer_reviews.text: Great while it worked. Had it a few months. My wife carried it in her purse. Pulled it out to take a pic and the LCD screen was broken beneath the outer layer. Found many postings online of similar results. Not covered under warranty. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hai Yawl

customer_reviews.title: Battery Problems
customer_reviews.text: If you take the camera outside in cold weather,(very short time) you won't be able to shoot. Battery won't operate. Go back inside, take battery out and reinstall, the camera works again.
customer_reviews.author: KDee

customer_reviews.title: Daytime Only Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great for outdoor sunny use. Any other time it produces blurry images. If you raise the ISO over 200 the image is also very grainy. I would only recommend getting this camera if you are only willing to take outdoor still pictures on sunny days.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Boulanger

customer_reviews.title: easy...easy share
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera as a gift for my adult daughter. She has been very happy with the clarity and color of the pictures she has taken. The camera is extremely easy to use. I found the best price through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Kodak Moment
customer_reviews.text: Like that its stylish...but have issues with a few things. Shutter speed is molasses in winter slow. It has demonic possession issues...shut off a couple of times unexpectedly. (yes, the camera was fully charged at the time) Over all, it is a fun new toy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marie A. Snay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: Got this camera for the girlfriend for Christmas, and she loves it. Takes great crisp photos and is very compact. For the price it's unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Brazitis

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Really like the Camera. Only thing that could be better is the instructions or owners manual could be more detailed. Instructions are very Vague.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Kodak EasyShare V803 8MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Silver Argent)
customer_reviews.text: I use the camera primarily for work. It takes wonderful pictures of the properties, however, the camera takes poor indoor pictures of people.
customer_reviews.author: KeKeB

customer_reviews.title: Camera review
customer_reviews.text: very unhappy with the service. i bought this camera as a christmas gift. when it was opened and tried out, it was found that the camera did not work, it had vertical lines down the pictures taken. Since I had purchased it as a chrstmas gift, it had been past 15 days since the delivery date, so I am unable to return it. i am very unhappy with this service and i will never purchase anything off amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Busch

customer_reviews.title: This camera is TOO DELICATE
customer_reviews.text: I bought the V1003. Just the same one but with 10 MP. This camera has good quality pics/ 10 MB. It is kind of slow. I bought one about 25 days ago. THERE IS ONE BIG FLAW. The LCD screen is not protected. Many digital cameras do have a protective HARD COVER for the LCD screen. This camera is TOO DELICATE. I have bought more than 5 digital cameras for the last 5 years. This is the FIRST ONE that I broke the LCD screen.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card Recipient

customer_reviews.title: Kodak EasyShare V803
customer_reviews.text: I gave this camera as a gift for my daughter. The first one I gave her broke and Amazon sent another quickly. She hasn't used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: aimeelisbet

product_meta.title: Kodak Easyshare V803 8 MP Digital Camera with 3xOptical Zoom (Midnight Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Midnight blackFROM THE MANUFACTURER
Meet your Kodak EasyShare V803 zoom digital camera. Take your best pictures with it, then keep them with you thanks to its Favorites feature. Pick your signature color and get the fun accessories to match. And, with its dynamic picture quality, you can share shots that are as vibrant and detailed as life. The V803--make a statement.

 Amazing quality prints with 8.0-megapixel resolution


 * 8.0-megapixel resolution means you can make stunning prints up to 16 x 22 inches 
 * Capture bright, beautiful color with Kodak Color Science 
 * However you choose to print--at home, at retail, or online--trust Kodak for picture quality that's truly exceptional and for memories that will last

3x optical zoom lens
 * The Kodak Retinar 3x optical aspheric all-glass lens captures crisp details 
 * 3x optical zoom (35 mm equivalent: 36-108 mm) gets you closer to your subjects without losing image quality

Make a statement
The V803 is all about fun. Fresh colors. Dynamic ways to personalize. Capture the world your way with the V803.  * Customize your experience with on-camera settings 
 * Keep special pictures close with the Favorites feature 
 * Make a statement--choose from many fresh camera colors and a range of fun accessories

Favorites feature--part of the exclusive on-camera Share button
 * Your camera's always with you and, thanks to the Favorites feature, now your best pictures are, too 
 * Stores your favorite shots on your camera without taking up internal memory 
 * It's simple to save a picture as a Favorite--just use the Share button and your camera automatically makes and saves a copy of the original at a lower resolution 
 * Favorites makes it simple to find your best shots. Once you mark a picture as a Favorite you can easily find it--on your camera, in Kodak EasyShare Software, and on the Kodak EasyShare Gallery

Fun accessories (not included--must be purchased separately)
 * With a full line of accessories--including bags, skins, and wrist and neck straps--you can do more and have more fun with your camera

Kodak Perfect Touch Technology 
Make your pictures as vivid as the moment you took them. Print better, brighter pictures using Kodak Perfect Touch Technology.  * Make better, brighter pictures 
 * Relive your memories in richer detail 
 * Clear up dark shadows to reveal more smiles

Anti-blur mode
 * Reduces blur caused by camera shake, subject movement, and low-light conditions.

Scene modes and picture enhancing features
 * Capture a great shot time after time with multiple scene modes such as children, snow, beach, backlight, and fireworks 
 * Get brighter pictures when shooting under low-light conditions with the high ISO scene mode 
 * Easily create great shots with features such as on-camera cropping, blurry picture alert, and digital red-eye reduction 
 * Convenience features such as on-camera help and undo-delete make picture taking simple

Large, high resolution display
 * Get a good look at your pictures on the large 2.5-inch (6.4-centimeter) high resolution indoor/outdoor color display 
 * See your pictures with brightness and clarity--even in direct sunlight

Advanced video features
 * Record VGA video (640 x 480) at 30 frames per second (fps) with sound 
 * Capture more video while using less memory with MPEG-4 compression 
 * Print multiple frames on a 4 x 6-inch print 
 * Save single frames and e-mail family and friends 
 * Mark special spots in your video with video bookmarking

Internal memory plus
 * Don't miss a shot if your memory card becomes full--switch to in-camera memory quickly, thanks to the internal memory plus feature 
 * 32MB internal memory and SD/MMC card expansion slot let you start shooting right out of the box

On-camera Share button
 * Sharing starts right on the back of the camera 
 * Have a picture you want to share? Tag it using the exclusive on-camera Share button and it will be ready to print or e-mail later 
 * Use the Favorites feature to keep special pictures close without filling your internal memory

Kodak EasyShare Software (included)
The simplest way to find, create, and share.  * The award-winning, elegant design makes your pictures the star of the show for a more enjoyable viewing experience 
 * English, French, and German photo card templates turn pictures into 4 x 6-inch announcements, invitations, holiday cards, and more, right at home 
 * Download new photo borders and photo cards for more creative choices 
 * Get more out of Kodak EasyShare Software with a variety of useful tips 
 * Use Kodak EasyShare Software to access your pictures at the Kodak EasyShare Gallery--then view, edit, and save them to My Collection 
 * Automatically print better, brighter pictures, time after time, with Kodak Perfect Touch Technology and award-winning Kodak Printers and Printer Docks

What's in the box
Kodak EasyShare V803 Zoom digital camera, Kodak Li-Ion battery KLIC-7003, USB cable, 5V AC adapter with power cord(s) for in-camera battery charging, Getting Started Guide with Kodak EasyShare Software, custom camera insert for optional Kodak EasyShare Camera and Printer Docks, carry strap
feature_bullets: 8-megapixel CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 16 x 22-inch prints
3x optical zoom with all-glass Kodak Retinar lens; 2.5-inch LCD display
"Favorites" feature earmarks and resaves favorite photos for easy access later
Stores images on SD memory cards (includes 32MB internal memory); powered by lithium-ion battery (battery and charger included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars83 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
